name: Autonomous Flight Tasks with Drones
description: Learned about feedback control systems and how they are applied to autonomous drones. Learning was supplemented using MIT's 16.30 Feedback Control Systems online course and the PARROT Rolling Spyder drone

name: AI Maze Solving Application
description: A configurable maze solving CLI application written in C++. This was developed as an assignment for my course in artificial intelligence and was used to explore the concept of search heuristics.

name: Traffic Sign Recognition System
description: This basic application segments traffic signs from driving scenery and classifies them. This was a final project for my computer vision and machine learning course. This system will likely be updated in the future!

name: BookOrder Web Application
description: This web application was in response to a real need on campus for a web portal that allows teachers to submit new books for the coming semester. Though the application never went live, it was a great opportunity for the team to conduct interviews and gather requirements to create a successful product.
